MS MCQs

    Record fixed asset opening transactions in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. You want to post opening transactions for fixed assets for which only fixed asset ledger entries should be posted. Which of the following settings should be used?

      Disable G/L Integration on the depreciation book and use the FA G/L journal.

      Enable G/L Integration on the depreciation book and use the FA journal.

      Disable G/L Integration on the depreciation book and use the FA journal.

      Enable G/L Integration on the depreciation book and use the FA G/L journal.


    2. What can you do when you need to post opening transactions for many assets?

      You can use RapidStart Services to import data from Excel.

      You can run the Generate Opening Transactions report.

      From the chart of accounts, you can run the Copy Opening Transactions function from Balance Sheet.

      You can only post opening transactions by manually entering them in the fixed assets journal.
